  • Constructor Details

      public AppointmentService()

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public List<AppointmentDto> getAllAppointments(LocalDate timeStart, LocalDate timeEnd)
      Retrieves a list of appointments within the specified time interval. * If the start time is later than the end time, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. * If the user does not have a valid role ("ROLE_DOCTOR" or "ROLE_PATIENT"), an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. * For patients, appointments are filtered by the patient's ID and mapped to DTOs using the patient mapping service. * For doctors, appointments are filtered by the doctor's ID and mapped to DTOs using the doctor mapping service.
      Parameters:
      timeStart - the beginning of the time interval for which slots are shown.
      timeEnd - the ending of the time interval for which slots are shown.
      Returns:
      list AppointmentDto over a given time period
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the start time is later than the end time or if the user does not have a valid role.

    • getFutureAppointmentsPatient

      public List<AppointmentDto> getFutureAppointmentsPatient()
      Retrieves a list of future appointments AppointmentDto for the patient.

      If the user is not found, a UserNotFoundException is thrown. If the user does not have a valid role ("ROLE_DOCTOR" or "ROLE_PATIENT"), an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. For patients, future appointments are filtered by the patient's ID and mapped to DTOs using the patient mapping service. For doctors, future appointments are filtered by the doctor's ID and mapped to DTOs using the doctor mapping service.

      Returns:
      A list of future appointment DTOs for the patient.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user does not have a valid role.
      See Also:
      • AppointmentMappingService.mapEntityToDtoPatient(Appointment)
      • AppointmentMappingService.mapEntityToDtoDoctor(Appointment)

    • getPastAppointmentsPatient

      public List<AppointmentDto> getPastAppointmentsPatient()
      Retrieves a list of past appointments for the patient.

      If the user is not found, a UserNotFoundException is thrown. If the user does not have the "ROLE_PATIENT" role, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. Past appointments are filtered by the patient's ID and mapped to DTOs using the AppointmentMappingService.mapEntityToDtoPatient(Appointment) method.

      Returns:
      A list of past appointment DTOs for the patient.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user does not have the "ROLE_PATIENT" role.
      See Also:
      • AppointmentMappingService.mapEntityToDtoPatient(Appointment)

    • getAppointmentById

      public AppointmentDto getAppointmentById(int id) throws AccessDeniedException
      Retrieves an appointment by its ID.

      If the appointment is not found, an AppointmentNotFoundException is thrown. If the current user does not have access to the appointment (neither as a patient nor as a doctor), an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the appointment to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The appointment DTO if found and the user has access.
      Throws:
      AppointmentNotFoundException - if the appointment with the specified ID is not found.
      AccessDeniedException - if the user does not have access to the appointment.

    • saveAppointment

      public int saveAppointment(AppointmentRequest request)
      Saves a new appointment or updates an existing one based on the provided request.

      If the appointment ID in the request is not 0 and an appointment with that ID exists, the existing appointment is updated with the new information. If the appointment ID in the request is 0 or the appointment with the ID does not exist, a new appointment is created.

      Only authorised users can create or modify their appointments.

      Parameters:
      request - The appointment request containing the necessary information.
      Returns:
      The ID of the saved or updated appointment.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if a user involved in the appointment (either doctor or patient) is not found.
      SlotNotFoundException - if the slot specified in the request is not found.

    • deleteById

      public void deleteById(int id) throws AccessDeniedException
      Deletes an appointment by its ID if the authenticated user has the necessary permissions.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the appointment to delete.
      Throws:
      AccessDeniedException - If the authenticated user does not have the necessary permissions.
      AppointmentNotFoundException - If the appointment with the specified ID is not found.
